truths: 🙊 Have you ever lied to your parents? 🙊
dares: 📞 Call a friend and speak in a funny voice! 📞

truths: 📱 What's the most embarrassing thing in your search history? 📱
dares: 📱 Show the last 5 photos on your phone! 📱

truths: 💋 Have you ever kissed on the first date? 💋
